com.procom.filefly

Class DocumentListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • com.procom.filefly.DocumentListAdapter

  • public class DocumentListAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    The android.widget.BaseAdapter used to back the ListView hosted by the DocumentListFragment using Documents as the data model.
    Since:
    2014-09-14
    Version:
    0.2a
    Author:
    Peter Piech
